valid: For the period 00:00 (UTC) on Fri 30 Jan 2026 to 00:00 (UTC) on Sat 31 Jan 2026
general_synopsis: Atlantic low moving rapidly east expected Plymouth 974 by 1800 Friday. Low near Shannon 970 expected Rockall 974 by same time

Wind
In southwest, southeast 6 to gale 8, occasionally severe gale 9. In northeast, southeast 4 to 6.

Snow showers.
